definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: This thesis concentrates on the parallel techniques and their applications in computational electromagnetics.
sentences.chinese: 本文着力於計算電磁學中並行技術及其應用的研究。

sentences.english: A 5tool measures the casing-wall thickness either electromagnetically or mechanically.
sentences.chinese: 下井儀器按照電磁學原理或者機械原理測量套管壁厚。

sentences.english: Time Domain Transient Electromagnetic Field(TDTEF) is a frontier branch of modern electromagnetics.
sentences.chinese: 時域瞬態電磁場是現代電磁學的前沿研究領域。

sentences.english: In particular, electromagnetism is a very abstract subject.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是，電磁學是很抽象的學科。

sentences.english: Seismo-electromagnetism is widely used for earthquake forecast.
sentences.chinese: 地震電磁學的技術應用是地震預報的基礎。

sentences.english: Tesla electromagnetics are composed of potentials and their corresponding motion.
sentences.chinese: 特斯拉的電磁學是由勢能組成，它們相當於運動。

sentences.english: The application of finite elements method (FEM) in electromagnetics has a history of 30 years.
sentences.chinese: 有限元法在電磁學中的應用已有30年的歷史了。

sentences.english: The equations of electromagnetism weathered the revolution of relativity unchanged.
sentences.chinese: 經受過相對論變革之後的電磁學方程並沒有變化。

sentences.english: Tne equations of electromagnetism weathered the revolution of relativity unchanged.
sentences.chinese: 經受過相對論變革之後的電磁學方程並沒有變化。
